channel.title: Deltascape NPC Glitch and question
channel.description:
Heres my NPC Glitch:
When I attack the npc it always hits a 0.
Now my question:
How do I set the attack strength and defense of a monster.
1 more question:
I changed the monsters combat level from 130 to 500 in npc.cfg and in the client files but it still displays combat 130.
